item.title: Master Thesis and further material released
item.description:
Today, we finally released Lukas’ Master Thesis, as well as some other interesting material about HNAP. Have fun reading!

  • Master thesis by Lukas Ostendorf: Design of a Radio Communications Protocol for HAMNET Access in the 70cm Amateur Radio Band
  • Presentation: HNAP - The HAMNET Access Protocol
  • Article about HNAP (deutsch)
  • Talk about HNAP at the Software Defined Radio Academy 2020

item.title: Recording of the HNAP talk at SDRA 2020 now online!
item.description:
Today, the recording of Lukas’ talk about HNAP at the HAM RADIO online/SDRA2020 was published on Youtube!

Enjoy watching!

item.title: Article about HNAP in CQ DL magazine
item.description:
The first part of a german article about “Hamnet auf 70 cm mit dem PlutoSDR” has been published in the magazine CQ DL 7-2020.
We will provide both parts here as soon as the second part has been published in CQ DL 8-2020.

item.title: Save the date: 28.06.2020 16:00 - HNAP-Talk at SDRA 2020
item.description:
Lukas will give the talk “HNAP for Pluto-SDR - Implementing the HAMNET Access Protocol on the Adalm Pluto SDR” at the Software Defined Radio Academy which will be held “online” in 2020: https://2020.sdra.io/pages/programme.html.
There will be a live chat channel availble to receive comments and questions. Feel free to get in touch.
